title: Image Generation â€” Gemini
author: Jarvis Inc
curl_example: curl -s -X POST 'https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.0-flash-exp-image-generation:generateContent?key=$GEMINI_API_KEY' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"contents": [{"parts": [{"text": "A pixel art office with retro computers"}]}], "generationConfig": {"responseModalities": ["TEXT", "IMAGE"]}}'

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate images from a text prompt using Gemini

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Detailed text description of the image to generate

returns.description: Generated image as base64 with optional text response from the model
